short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your Wikipedia pages dark and easy on the eyes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Dark mode for wikipedia
* Easy on the eyes
* Gray-blue dark theme

What's new in v0.3
* Added border-radius to boxes and images
* Changed some colors for better readability
* Changed texts to justify aligned
